sqlMap.select: select SC_JOB_ID, SC_ORG_ID, JOB_CODE, JOB_NAME, JOB_CLASS, JOB_LEVEL from SC_JOB where SC_JOB_ID = #scJobId:DECIMAL#
select SC_JOB_ID, SC_ORG_ID, JOB_CODE, JOB_NAME, JOB_CLASS, JOB_LEVEL from SC_JOB where SC_ORG_ID = #orgId:DECIMAL#
sqlMap.insert: insert into SC_JOB (SC_JOB_ID, SC_ORG_ID, JOB_CODE, JOB_NAME, JOB_CLASS, JOB_LEVEL) values (#scJobId:DECIMAL#, #scOrgId:DECIMAL#, #jobCode:VARCHAR#, #jobName:VARCHAR#, #jobClass:VARCHAR#, #jobLevel:VARCHAR#)
sqlMap.update: update SC_JOB set SC_ORG_ID = #scOrgId:DECIMAL#, JOB_CODE = #jobCode:VARCHAR#, JOB_NAME = #jobName:VARCHAR#, JOB_CLASS = #jobClass:VARCHAR#, JOB_LEVEL = #jobLevel:VARCHAR# where SC_JOB_ID = #scJobId:DECIMAL#

update SC_JOB
SC_ORG_ID = #scOrgId:DECIMAL#
JOB_CODE = #jobCode:VARCHAR#
JOB_NAME = #jobName:VARCHAR#
JOB_CLASS = #jobClass:VARCHAR#
JOB_LEVEL = #jobLevel:VARCHAR#
where SC_JOB_ID = #scJobId:DECIMAL#
